#####
Tools
#####

Overview
========

The upstream code repository of Libabigail contains several tools
written using the library.  They are maintained and released as part
of the project.  All tools come with a bash-completion script.

Tools manuals
=============

   :maxdepth: 2

   abidiff
   abipkgdiff
   kmidiff
   abidw
   abicompat
   abilint
   fedabipkgdiff
